name: Project Tracker
description: Create and track projects using goals, tasks, and milestones
system_prompt: You have project tracking tools. When a user wants to start a new project, use create_project to set up a goal with tasks. Use update_project_status to log progress. Use get_project_overview for a full picture of a project. Projects are backed by goals (for high-level tracking) and tasks (for actionable items).

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create a new project with a goal, milestones, and initial tasks

description.description: What the project aims to achieve

tools.code: const goal = await utils.callTool('create_goal', { title: args.name, description: args.description, category: 'project' }); if (args.milestones) { const milestoneNames = args.milestones.split(',').map(m => m.trim()).filter(Boolean); for (const ms of milestoneNames) { await utils.callTool('decompose_goal', { goalId: goal.id || goal.goalId, subtask: ms }); } } const tasks = []; if (args.initial_tasks) { const taskNames = args.initial_tasks.split(',').map(t => t.trim()).filter(Boolean); for (const t of taskNames) { const task = await utils.callTool('add_task', { title: t, description: 'Part of project: ' + args.name }); tasks.push(task); } } await utils.callTool('create_memory', { content: 'Created project: ' + args.name + ' - ' + args.description }); return { content: { project: args.name, goal, tasks_created: tasks.length } };

tools.name: update_project_status
tools.description: Update project progress by completing a task or milestone
tools.code: const goals = await utils.callTool('list_goals', { status: 'active' }); const projectGoal = Array.isArray(goals) ? goals.find(g => g.title && g.title.toLowerCase().includes(args.project_name.toLowerCase())) : null; const tasks = await utils.callTool('list_tasks', { status: 'pending' }); const projectTasks = Array.isArray(tasks) ? tasks.filter(t => t.description && t.description.includes(args.project_name)) : []; if (args.completed_task) { const matchTask = projectTasks.find(t => t.title && t.title.toLowerCase().includes(args.completed_task.toLowerCase())); if (matchTask) { await utils.callTool('complete_task', { id: matchTask.id }); } } if (args.notes) { await utils.callTool('create_memory', { content: 'Project ' + args.project_name + ' update: ' + args.notes }); } return { content: { project: args.project_name, goal: projectGoal, pending_tasks: projectTasks.length, notes: args.notes || null } };

tools.name: get_project_overview
tools.description: Get a comprehensive overview of a project including goal, tasks, and recent memories
tools.code: const goals = await utils.callTool('list_goals', {}); const projectGoal = Array.isArray(goals) ? goals.find(g => g.title && g.title.toLowerCase().includes(args.project_name.toLowerCase())) : null; let goalDetails = null; if (projectGoal) { goalDetails = await utils.callTool('get_goal_details', { goalId: projectGoal.id || projectGoal.goalId }); } const allTasks = await utils.callTool('list_tasks', {}); const projectTasks = Array.isArray(allTasks) ? allTasks.filter(t => t.description && t.description.includes(args.project_name)) : []; const memories = await utils.callTool('search_memories', { query: 'project ' + args.project_name, limit: 5 }); return { content: { project: args.project_name, goal: goalDetails || projectGoal, tasks: { pending: projectTasks.filter(t => t.status !== 'completed'), completed: projectTasks.filter(t => t.status === 'completed') }, recent_updates: memories } };
